name: Butternut Squash & Apple Soup
description: Squash is packed with phytonutrients (carotenoid)—an antioxidant important for anti-cancer properties. Squash is also an excellent source of Vitamins C and A, and rich in potassium, which helps lower blood pressure.

ingredients.name: butternut squash
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks

preparation: Melt butter in a Multipurpose Pot. Add onions, curry, and ginger. Cook, covered, over low heat until onion is tender, about 5 minutes.
Add Nourish Broth, squash, and apples, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, partially covered, for about 20–25 minutes, until squash and apples are tender.
Working in batches, purée solids in a blender or food processor.
Return purée to pot. Add apple juice and heat. Season with Salt and Pepper. Garnish with grated apple, if desired, and drizzle with finishing sauce.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
